# allFonts

**Type Property**

All fonts in the system.

## Declaration

```swift
static let allFonts: NSFontCollection.Name
```

## Type Properties

- **user**: Per-user unmodifiable collection.
- **favorites**: Font collection of the user’s preferred font descriptors.
- **recentlyUsed**: Font collection automatically maintained by NSFontManager.

items.description: Font collection of the user’s preferred font descriptors.
